title: Jd

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Get an Idea. Must be a challenge

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you get an idea, it is publicly announced to the town.
- Those who win are granted some form of buff
- Those who lose get nothing
- Those who don't participate are RB'd the next night.
- If you're the first to die, then your attacker is attacked with modkill level attack OR everyone who voted guilty is attacked with modkill level attack
- Challenges must be a minigame. You choose the minigame and wincon of said minigame
- Sometimes, some people don't deserve second chances, so you are unable to win with AccentAigoo (1867) Aigoo, Scarlet Andante (2096), The Rasen (545), Rasen (680), Rasen of Spiraling Heavens (2009), Rasen Demigod of Ice (2595), Rasen (3046), Rasen (3943). In addition, this role may not be rolled by neither Aigoo neither nor Rasen, should they ever play again.
- You will become Jd, the Betrayed (406.5) if at least 3 roles made by the following people vote you or fail to participate in your challenge
-- Rasen
-- Aigoo
Goal:Have 5 people win one of your minigames

desc:
Post 406
*Alright, Time to go to work...*
